name: CEO
description: Chief Executive Officer, the highest-ranking executive of the company, responsible for overall company operations and strategy.

children.name: CTO
children.description: Chief Technology Officer, responsible for overseeing the company's technology infrastructure and strategy.

children.name: Project Manager
children.description: Project Manager, Manages the planning, execution, and monitoring of projects to ensure they are completed on time, within budget, and to the required quality standards.

children.name: Product Owner
children.description: Product Owner, Responsible for understanding and conveying the needs of the users and stakeholders to the development team.

children.name: Tech Lead
children.description: Tech Lead, Leads a team of developers in the design, development, and implementation of software.

children.name: Frontend Developer
children.description: Frontend Developer, Develops the user interface (UI) of web applications.

children.name: Backend Developer
children.description: Backend Developer, Develops the server-side logic of web applications.

children.name: DevOps Engineer
children.description: DevOps Engineer, Automates and optimizes the process of software development, deployment, and operation.

children.name: QA Engineer
children.description: QA Engineer, Tests software to ensure it meets quality standards.

children.name: Scrum Master
children.description: Scrum Master, Facilitates the Scrum process and helps the team to be more productive.

children.name: CFO
children.description: Chief Financial Officer, responsible for overseeing the company's financial operations and strategy.

children.name: Chef Accountant
children.description: Chef Accountant, Oversees the accounting department and ensures that the company's financial records are accurate and up-to-date.

children.name: Financial Analyst
children.description: Financial Analyst, Analyzes financial data to identify trends and make recommendations.

children.name: Account and Payable
children.description: Account and Payable, Manages the company's accounts payable and ensures that bills are paid on time.

children.name: Internal Audit
children.description: Internal Audit, Conducts audits to ensure that the company's financial controls are adequate and that the company is complying with all applicable laws and regulations.

children.name: COO
children.description: Chief Operating Officer, responsible for overseeing the company's day-to-day operations.

children.name: Product Manager
children.description: Product Manager, Responsible for understanding and conveying the needs of the users and stakeholders to the development team.

children.name: Operation Manager
children.description: Operation Manager, Manages the day-to-day operations of the business.

children.name: Customer Relation
children.description: Customer Relation, Manages the company's relationships with its customers.

children.name: HR
children.description: Human Resources, responsible for managing the company's human resources, including recruiting, hiring, training, and compensation.
